summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of NICU Approaches page. All 16 NICU approaches are working correctly with proper clinical content. Search functionality, dropdown selector, patient info inputs, and drug calculations all function as expected.

issues: Console warning: Missing `Description` or `aria-describedby={undefined}` for {DialogContent} - accessibility improvement recommended

passed_tests: NICU Approaches page loads correctly when navigating to /nicu/approaches

All 16 NICU approaches listed in dropdown selector (alphabetically sorted): Anaemia, Apnoea, BPD, HIE, Hypoglycemia, Jaundice, MAS, NEC, PDA, Polycythaemia, PPHN, RDS, Resuscitation, Seizures, Sepsis, TTN
Dropdown selector changes displayed approach content correctly
Search functionality filters approaches - searching 'jaundice' shows only Jaundice approach
Search auto-selects first matching result
Patient info inputs functional: GA (weeks), Postnatal Age (days), Weight (kg)
Drug calculations display correctly when weight is entered (e.g., Ampicillin 75mg for 1.5kg, Phenobarbital 36mg for 1.8kg)
Back button navigates from Approaches page to NICU dashboard
Navigation flow works: Dashboard > NICU > Approaches widget
Approaches widget visible on NICU dashboard (widget-approaches)
Sepsis approach shows EOS/LOS classification, risk factors, antibiotic dosing
HIE approach shows Sarnat Staging (I, II, III), therapeutic hypothermia criteria
NEC approach shows Bell Staging, clinical presentation, management
Jaundice approach shows phototherapy thresholds, IVIG indication, exchange transfusion
RDS approach shows definition, risk factors, clinical diagnosis
Apnoea approach shows types (Central, Obstructive, Mixed), incidence by GA
PDA approach shows definition, incidence table, clinical features
Seizures approach shows types, management algorithm, phenobarbital dosing
PPHN approach shows definition, pathophysiology, management
MAS approach shows definition, pathophysiology, risk factors
BPD approach shows definition, risk factors, management
Anaemia approach shows definition, Hb/Hct table by age, causes
Polycythaemia approach shows definition, risk factors
TTN approach shows definition, clinical features
Hypoglycemia approach shows definition, management
Resuscitation approach shows NRP algorithm, risk factors for high-risk birth
action_items: Minor: Add aria-describedby to DialogContent in Medical Disclaimer modal for accessibility
critical_code_review_comments: All 16 NICU approach components properly implemented in /approaches/ directory
data-testid attributes correctly implemented for all key elements
Dropdown selector uses alphabetically sorted approaches list
Search functionality with keyword matching works correctly
Weight-based drug calculations implemented in approach components
Patient info inputs (GA, Postnatal, Weight) passed as props to all approach components
Reference footer shows WHO Neonatal Clinical Guidelines source
context_for_next_testing_agent: NICU Approaches page is fully functional. All 16 approaches (Anaemia, Apnoea, BPD, HIE, Hypoglycemia, Jaundice, MAS, NEC, PDA, Polycythaemia, PPHN, RDS, Resuscitation, Seizures, Sepsis, TTN) render correctly with comprehensive clinical content. Search filters approaches by keywords. Patient inputs (GA, Postnatal Age, Weight) display calculated drug doses in approach components. Navigation: Dashboard > NICU > Approaches widget works correctly. Back button returns to NICU dashboard.
